headline:
Cloudflare Global Network Spans 137 Cities:
Launching Durban and Port Louis Data Centers
keywords: March of Cloudflare, Data Center, Cloudflare Network, Africa, South Africa
description: Our newest data centers in Durban and Port Louis expand the Cloudflare network to 137 cities globally. We are delighted to reach this special milestone, and even more excited to help improve the performance and security of over 7 million Internet properties (and growing!) across 69 countries.
